    • About Carlos Gutierrez


    As a native of San Diego and a resident of Mission Beach, I first became famous for my role as the San Diego State University mascot, Monte Montezuma, for over 13 years. In 2005, I began my career as a real estate consultant. I have worked with clients all over the San Diego area and know how to manage all kinds of properties and people.

    My skills and work ethic allow me to work with a wide range of clients that include first time home buyers and multi million dollar investors. With an extensive background in marketing and real estate, I continue to deliver an unmatched level of experience, enthusiasm and loyalty to each and every client.

    Carlos Gutierrez
    Coldwell Banker
    930 Prospect St
    La Jolla CA 92037
    858-864-8741
    Carlos@CarlosGSellSSanDiego.com
    CarlosGSellSSanDiego.com

    I’m actually one of Carlos’ preferred vendors so I work with him a lot when he’s getting a home ready to sell. I’ve had a lot of experience working with him side-by-side and we’ve built up a good reputation. We work with about 3 professionals and we all refer each other for different services from handyman work, landscaping, and photography. We all get the house ready to sell and work on the curb appeal which really helps Carlos out. He’s a go-getter, hustler, and really gets on top of getting his homes ready to sell. He really keeps things moving forward for everybody.

    Show Less

    - Sean
